entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
